channel.title: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic
channel.description:
I think it would be neat to add a quest log to the current quest system when u click on the individual quest to Read the log... to give it a little more uniqueness.. What are your thoughts?
Example: Cooks Assistant Quest
Stage 0: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img853/479/cooksassistantstage0.png[/img]
Stage 1: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img843/8461/cooksassistantstage1.png[/img]
Stage 1: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img163/1065/cooksassistantstage1all.png[/img]
Stage 2: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img28/773/cooksassistantcomplete.png[/img]

item.title: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Nice, would look fine with transparent boxes like peeter did with the smith interface.

Read full topic
item.source: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic

item.title: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Regardless of whether or not people know how to do the quest, they never use the quest journal. I went through at least 40 or so quests in RS2 without opening it once. People just use guides on sites like tip.it and such.

Read full topic
item.source: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic

item.title: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:5, topic:515802”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=634057.msg4281946#msg4281946 date=1365774175]

[quote author=imthenull link=topic=634057.msg4281896#msg4281896 date=1365744191]
Did you take this dialog from rs2? Lol, seems like a cool idea but everyone who plays classic has done all the quests at least 50 times.
[/quote]Lol, no. Most people haven’t done all the quests once.

Questing on RSC sucked, which is why questing services made so much money.
[/quote]a lot of people i know knows each quest by heart, it’s safe to assume a lot more do too.[/quote]I know 0 people that did every quest in the period before they started reopening RSC. Though, I know many that did a select few quests many times, when they made stakers and such.

Read full topic
item.source: Quest Log :: small add-on to classic

item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

I suggest you to use different colors for npcs, items and places/objects.
